foreignData.name: Neerdiv, plongeuse fourbe
foreignData.text:
À chaque fois que Neerdiv, plongeuse fourbe devient engagée, un joueur ciblé meule un nombre de cartes égal à sa force.
À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort depuis votre cimetière ou que vous activez une capacité d'une carte dans votre cimetière, piochez une carte et mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur Neerdiv.

foreignData.name: Neerdiv, durchtriebene Taucherin
foreignData.text:
Immer wenn Neerdiv, durchtriebene Taucherin, getappt wird, millt ein Spieler deiner Wahl so viele Karten, wie ihre Stärke beträgt.
Immer wenn du einen Zauberspruch aus deinem Friedhof wirkst oder eine Fähigkeit einer Karte in deinem Friedhof aktivierst, ziehe eine Karte und lege eine +1/+1-Marke auf Neerdiv.

foreignData.name: Neerdiv, Tuffatrice Subdola
foreignData.text:
Ogniqualvolta Neerdiv, Tuffatrice Subdola viene TAPpata, un giocatore bersaglio macina carte pari alla sua forza.
Ogniqualvolta lanci una magia dal tuo cimitero o attivi un'abilità di una carta nel tuo cimitero, pesca una carta e metti un segnalino +1/+1 su Neerdiv.

foreignData.name: 抜け目ない潜り手、ニアディヴ
foreignData.text:
抜け目ない潜り手、ニアディヴがタップ状態になるたび、プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはこれのパワーに等しい枚数のカードを切削する。
あなたがあなたの墓地から呪文１つを唱えるかあなたの墓地にあるカードの能力１つを起動するたび、カード１枚を引き、これの上に＋１/＋１カウンター１個を置く。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — マーフォーク・ならず者

foreignData.name: Neerdiv, buceadora taimada
foreignData.text:
Siempre que Neerdiv, buceadora taimada se gire, el jugador objetivo muele una cantidad de cartas igual a su fuerza.
Siempre que lances un hechizo desde tu cementerio o actives una habilidad de una carta en tu cementerio, roba una carta y pon un contador +1/+1 sobre Neerdiv.

mainBoard.name: Neerdiv, Devious Diver
mainBoard.originalText:
Whenever Neerdiv, Devious Diver becomes tapped, target player mills cards equal to its power.
Whenever you cast a spell from your graveyard or activate an ability of a card in your graveyard, draw a card and put a +1/+1 counter on Neerdiv.

rulings.text: If Neerdiv leaves the battlefield while its first ability is still on the stack, use its power as it last existed on the battlefield to determine how many cards the target player mills.
Neerdiv's last ability resolves before the spell or ability that caused it to trigger. It resolves even if that spell or ability is countered or otherwise leaves the stack without resolving.

mainBoard.text:

mainBoard.name: Cackling Counterpart
mainBoard.originalText:
Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control.
Flashback {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

rulings.text: "Flashback [cost]" means "You may cast this card from your graveyard by paying [cost] rather than paying its mana cost" and "If the flashback cost was paid, exile this card instead of putting it anywhere else any time it would leave the stack."
A spell cast using flashback will always be exiled afterward, whether it resolves, is countered, or leaves the stack in some other way.
If a card with flashback is put into your graveyard during your turn, you can cast it if it's legal to do so before any other player can take any actions.

To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost (such as a flashback cost) you're paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions. The mana value of the spell is determined only by its mana cost, no matter what the total cost to cast the spell was.
You can cast a spell using flashback even if it was somehow put into your graveyard without having been cast.

You must still follow any timing restrictions and permissions, including those based on the card's type. For instance, you can cast a sorcery using flashback only when you could normally cast a sorcery.

Any “enters” triggered ability of the copied creature will trigger when the token enters the battlefield. Any “as [this creature] enters” or “[this creature] enters with” abilities of the chosen creature will also work.
If the copied creature has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.
If the copied creature is a token, the token that’s created copies the original characteristics of that token as stated by the effect that created the token.
If the copied creature is copying something else, then the token enters the battlefield as whatever that creature copied.

The token copies exactly what was printed on the original creature and nothing else (unless that creature is copying something else or is a token; see below). It doesn’t copy whether that creature is tapped or untapped, whether it has any counters on it or Auras and Equipment attached to it, or any non-copy effects that have changed its power, toughness, types, color, or so on.

mainBoard.text:
Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control.
Flashback {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

mainBoard.name: Sudden Insight
mainBoard.originalText: Draw a card for each different mana value among nonland cards in your graveyard.

rulings.text: Although land cards aren't considered, nonland cards with mana value 0 are. For example if the cards in your graveyard are an artifact card with mana cost {X} and a sorcery card with mana cost {2}{U}, you'll draw two cards.
If a card in your graveyard has {X} in its mana cost, X is 0 when determining that card's mana value.

foreignData.name: Mystique des vagues imposantes
foreignData.text: À chaque fois que le Mystique des vagues imposantes inflige des blessures, un joueur ciblé meule autant de cartes. (Pour meuler une carte, un joueur met la carte du dessus de sa bibliothèque dans son cimetière.)

foreignData.flavorText: Thassas Gunst blieb ihm auch in der Unterwelt erhalten. Selbst die Wellen von Nerono fügten sich seinem Willen.
foreignData.name: Mystiker der Flutwellen
foreignData.text: Immer wenn der Mystiker der Flutwellen Schaden zufügt, millt ein Spieler deiner Wahl entsprechend viele Karten. (Um eine Karte zu millen, legt der Spieler die oberste Karte seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof.)

foreignData.flavorText: Il favore di Thassa lo seguì nell'Ade. Perfino le onde di Nerono obbedivano alla sua volontà.
foreignData.name: Mistico dell'Onda Colossale
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta il Mistico dell'Onda Colossale infligge danno, un giocatore bersaglio macina altrettante carte. (Per macinare una carta, un giocatore mette nel suo cimitero la prima carta del suo grimorio.)

foreignData.flavorText: タッサの寵愛は死の国でも続いた。ネロノの波までもが、彼の意思に従った。
foreignData.name: 高波の神秘家
foreignData.text: 高波の神秘家がダメージを与えるたび、プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはその点数に等しい枚数のカードを切削する。（カードを切削するとは、自分のライブラリーの一番上にあるカードを自分の墓地に置くことである。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — マーフォーク・ウィザード

foreignData.flavorText: La bendición de Tassa lo siguió al Inframundo. Hasta las olas de Nerono obedecían su voluntad.
foreignData.name: Místico del tsunami
foreignData.text: Siempre que el Místico del tsunami haga daño, el jugador objetivo muele esa misma cantidad de cartas. (Para moler una carta, un jugador pone la primera carta de su biblioteca en su cementerio.)

mainBoard.name: Towering-Wave Mystic
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever Towering-Wave Mystic deals damage, target player mills that many cards. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
mainBoard.text: Whenever this creature deals damage, target player mills that many cards.

mainBoard.flavorText: On the open sea, there is nowhere to hide.

foreignData.flavorText: En pleine mer, il n'y a nulle part où se cacher.
foreignData.name: Éveilleur des vagues
foreignData.text:
Les créatures que vos adversaires contrôlent gagnent -1/-0.
{1}{U}, défaussez-vous de l'Éveilleur des vagues : Regardez les deux cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Mettez l'une d'entre elles dans votre main et l'autre dans votre cimetière.

foreignData.flavorText: Auf offener See kann man sich nicht verstecken.
foreignData.name: Erwecker der Wellen
foreignData.text:
Kreaturen, die deine Gegner kontrollieren, erhalten -1/-0.
{1}{U}, wirf den Erwecker der Wellen ab: Schaue dir die obersten zwei Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Nimm eine davon auf deine Hand und lege die andere auf deinen Friedhof.

foreignData.flavorText: In mare aperto, non c'è posto in cui nascondersi.
foreignData.name: Destaonde
foreignData.text:
Le creature controllate dai tuoi avversari prendono -1/-0.
{1}{U}, Scarta il Destaonde: Guarda le prime due carte del tuo grimorio. Aggiungine una alla tua mano e metti l'altra nel tuo cimitero.

foreignData.flavorText: 大海原には隠れる場所などない。
foreignData.name: 波起こし
foreignData.text:
対戦相手がコントロールしているすべてのクリーチャーは－１/－０の修整を受ける。
{1}{U}, 波起こしを捨てる：あなたのライブラリーの一番上にあるカード２枚を見る。そのうち１枚をあなたの手札に、残りをあなたの墓地に置く。

foreignData.flavorText: En el mar abierto no hay donde esconderse.
foreignData.name: Despiertaolas
foreignData.text:
Las criaturas que controlan tus oponentes obtienen -1/-0.
{1}{U}, descartar la Despiertaolas: Mira las dos primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Pon una de ellas en tu mano y la otra en tu cementerio.

mainBoard.name: Waker of Waves
mainBoard.originalText:
Creatures your opponents control get -1/-0.
{1}{U}, Discard Waker of Waves: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

rulings.text: You can activate the last ability of Waker of Waves only if it's in your hand.

mainBoard.text:
Creatures your opponents control get -1/-0.
{1}{U}, Discard this card: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

mainBoard.flavorText: Those who intrude upon the Dimir seldom remember that they have done so.

foreignData.flavorText: Ceux qui s'infiltrent chez les Dimir s'en souviennent rarement.
foreignData.name: Mur des pensées perdues
foreignData.text:
Défenseur (Cette créature ne peut pas attaquer.)
Quand le Mur des pensées perdues arrive, un joueur ciblé meule quatre cartes. (Il met les quatre cartes du dessus de sa bibliothèque dans son cimetière.)

foreignData.flavorText: Wer den Dimir zu nahe kommt, erinnert sich nur selten daran.
foreignData.name: Mauer des Vergessens
foreignData.text:
Verteidiger (Diese Kreatur kann nicht angreifen.)
Wenn die Mauer des Vergessens ins Spiel kommt, millt ein Spieler deiner Wahl vier Karten. (Er legt die obersten vier Karten seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof.)

foreignData.flavorText: Chi si imbatte nei Dimir di rado ricorda di averlo fatto.
foreignData.name: Muro dei Pensieri Perduti
foreignData.text:
Difensore (Questa creatura non può attaccare.)
Quando il Muro dei Pensieri Perduti entra, un giocatore bersaglio macina quattro carte. (Mette nel suo cimitero le prime quattro carte del suo grimorio.)

foreignData.flavorText: ディミーアに侵入した者が、自分が何をしたのか覚えていることは滅多にない。
foreignData.name: 迷える思考の壁
foreignData.text:
防衛（このクリーチャーでは攻撃できない。）
迷える思考の壁が戦場に出たとき、プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはカード４枚を切削する。（そのプレイヤーは、自分のライブラリーの一番上にあるカード４枚を自分の墓地に置く。）

foreignData.flavorText: Aquellos que importunan al Gremio Dimir pocas veces lo recuerdan.
foreignData.name: Muro de los pensamientos perdidos
foreignData.text:
Defensor. (Esta criatura no puede atacar.)
Cuando el Muro de los pensamientos perdidos entre, el jugador objetivo muele cuatro cartas. (Pone las cuatro primeras cartas de su biblioteca en su cementerio.)

mainBoard.name: Wall of Lost Thoughts
mainBoard.originalText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Wall of Lost Thoughts enters, target player mills four cards. (They put the top four cards of their library into their graveyard.)
mainBoard.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When this creature enters, target player mills four cards. (They put the top four cards of their library into their graveyard.)

mainBoard.flavorText: All the wonders of the natural world in one breathtaking microcosm.

foreignData.flavorText: Toutes les merveilles de la nature dans un microcosme à couper le souffle.
foreignData.name: Île prospère
foreignData.text:
L'Île prospère arrive engagée. Au moment où elle arrive, choisissez une couleur autre que le bleu.
{T} : Ajoutez {U} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText: Alle Wunder der natürlichen Welt in einem einzigen atemberaubenden Mikrokosmos.
foreignData.name: Gedeihende Insel
foreignData.text:
Die Gedeihende Insel kommt getappt ins Spiel. Sowie sie ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Blau.
{T}: Erzeuge {U} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: Tutte le meraviglie della natura in un microcosmo mozzafiato.
foreignData.name: Isola Florida
foreignData.text:
L'Isola Florida entra TAPpata. Mentre entra, scegli un colore diverso dal blu.
{T}: Aggiungi {U} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: 自然界のあらゆる驚異がこの美しく小さな世界に詰まっている。
foreignData.name: 興隆する島嶼
foreignData.text:
興隆する島嶼はタップ状態で戦場に出る。これが戦場に出るに際し、青でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{U}か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: Todas las maravillas del mundo natural en un microcosmos asombroso.
foreignData.name: Islote floreciente
foreignData.text:
El Islote floreciente entra girado. En cuanto entre, elige un color que no sea azul.
{T}: Agrega {U} o un maná del color elegido.

mainBoard.name: Thriving Isle
mainBoard.originalText:
Thriving Isle enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than blue.
{T}: Add {U} or one mana of the chosen color.
mainBoard.text:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than blue.
{T}: Add {U} or one mana of the chosen color.
